title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Share in total export.
The highest category is found at Germany where Share in total export is 12.9.
The lowest category is found at Italy where Share in total export is 4.1.
gold: This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner of Bangladesh was Germany , with a share of 12.9 percent in exports .
